name: PicoTetris
description:
Description:

This is the second game I ever made, this was done on pico-8 again.

This is an attempt to recreate the classic tetris game.

There is a singleplayer mode as well as a two player mode.

Objective:

Fill a line with cubes to erase it and gain score, the more lines you fill at once, the more score you get.

In multiplayer mode, score isn't displayed but it's still recorded for the highscore.

Here when you complete lines you add the same number of erased lines to the opponent's field and disrupt them.

Controls:

← → to move ( S F for player 2) 

↑ for instant fall( E for player 2)

↓ for fast fall(D for player 2)

X to rotate (Q for player 2)
